description:
The compute node is now requiring libvirt be installed, which shouldn't be the case if you're running XenServer.

2011-03-24 23:48:28,313 ERROR nova.compute.manager [-] Unable to load the virtualization driver: No module named libvirt
title: New dependency on libvirt for compute node

comments.content:
The compute node is now requiring libvirt be installed, which shouldn't be the case if you're running XenServer.

2011-03-24 23:48:28,313 ERROR nova.compute.manager [-] Unable to load the virtualization driver: No module named libvirt
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris

comments.content:
Doesn't look like this is a real bug, rather something specific to my config.

I'll confirm that, then reject this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris
